Frequently Asked Questions

Will you shovel my walkway?

Although we do not hand shovel walkways as part of our seasonal driveway contracts, in order to keep our pricing affordable for everyone we will come out and provide you a quote for this additional service.

Will you spread salt on my driveway?

Eco friendly ice melt application is an optional upgrade to your seasonal snow package. If purchased, weâ€™ll return after every storm all season long and apply a non corrosive ice melter to the driveway. The goal is to cut through hard pack / ice. Slip free conditions are not guaranteed.

Can I leave a car parked in my driveway?

Absolutely, our drivers are trained to work around cars to make sure you have no trouble getting out in the morning. Once the Town plow has passed we will return for a cleanup. At this time we will send out an email that we are on our way so you can move your car.

When are the driveway markers installed And removed?

Our markers start going up late in October through early November. They will be taken out by early April. If you would like to remove them on your own sooner than that please place them by your garage and we will pick them up when we come around.

Will your tractors damage my driveway?

Believe it or not our tractors actually put less pressure on your driveway than your car does! Our blowers are also equipped with plastic runners to drastically reduce the risk of damage to your driveway.

No.
